medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a history of biliary colic. A couple of weeks ago, she underwent an ERCP with sphincterotomy and extraction of sludge from her bile duct. Symptoms progressed leading to the scheduling of a pancreatic duct stone removal and laparoscopic cholecystectomy.
medical_history.past_medical_history: choledocholithiasis, Hypertension, episode of elevated liver function tests
